description: This file defines a Dojo widget class 'Todos' for managing a todo list application, including model retrieval/persistence, routing, computed properties, and event handlers.

classes.name: Todos
classes.description: A Dojo widget class managing a todo list, including data store interactions, routing, and computed properties.

methods.name: postMixInProperties
methods.description: Initializes store if not set, sets up routing, and defines computed properties for filteredTodos, remainingCount, completedCount, and areAllChecked.

methods.name: addTodo
methods.description: Adds a new todo item to the store and updates the model.

methods.name: saveTodo
methods.description: Saves updates to an existing todo item in the store.

methods.name: removeTodo
methods.description: Removes a todo item from the store and updates the model.

methods.name: replaceTodo
methods.description: Replaces an old todo with a new one in the model.

methods.name: markAll
methods.description: Marks all todos as completed or active based on current state.

methods.name: clearCompletedTodos
methods.description: Removes all completed todos from the list.
